message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"to hear","sentence":"我听见了。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing a child standing in a ruined city landscape, cupping their hand to their ear as if trying to hear something, with subtle orange-tinged light filtering through broken buildings, evoking hope and listening carefully in the silence.","sentence_translation":"I heard it."}
